sourcesContent:
import Vue from 'vue'
import VueRouter from 'vue-router'
import App from '../App.vue'
import HandGestures from '../HandGestures.vue'

Vue.use(VueRouter)

const routes = [
  { path: '/', component: App },             // หน้าแปลภาษามือ
  { path: '/gestures', component: HandGestures } // หน้าแสดงท่ามือ
]

const router = new VueRouter({
  mode: 'history',
  routes
})

export default router
